location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Ext 4075/42 Movements of Mr W Taylor wishing to return from Bahrain to UK'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Government of India, External Department, the Foreign Office, and the Secretary of State for India, regarding Wilfred Taylor, a BAPCO employee wishing to return to the UK from Bahrain with his wife and son. The file also contains two letters from Taylor's father-in-law, T Rayner, and further correspondence advising him to contact the Political Agent at Bahrain.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
